caption.p: Location of study sites. ( A) North America, ( B) Europe. Numbers correspond to data sets ( S1). Black = bufonids; light grey = treefrogs; dark grey = ranids; white = salamanders and newts. Size of dot represents length of data set: large >20 yrs (n = 6); medium = 15–20 yrs (n = 5); small = 10–14 yrs (n = 20). Map produced using ArcMap Version 10.3.
